author: rajx1702
title: Great hotel with good location
text:
We stayed in this hotel for two nights with my husband and two kids of four and one.
Since I booked this hotel it already showed the great service it offers, as they promptly answered emails and offered help with transfer from airport and also with tours around Rome.
Once at the hotel we were greeted by a very nice and polite man, unfortunately don't remember his name, but he was very helpful and very knowledgeable, he even came up to the room to show us where and explain everything and also to help us with the luggage.
The room was quite big for Rome standards, we had a double bed, a single bed and a baby cot. A nice modern bathroom with a big shower.
Location was very good especially if one wants to travel with the metro as its only five minutes away. Also away from the very touristic areas.
If I can complain about something is that from the room all the noise of the street is heard, especially the traffic which keeps going till the early hours.
The breakfast is served in the restaurant beneath the hotel. Good choice of food.
All the staff were very helpful, one night our baby was very sick and they immediately got us clean sheets and explained how to get to a pharmacy close by.
If we visit Rome again will definitely stay here.
Thanks hotel Dharma for a lovely stay!
I definitely recommend
